RelatedSentence: SARAJEVO , Bosnia ( AP ) - Officials say landslides triggered by record - high floods have left hundreds of people homeless in Bosnia , while thousands more are fleeing their homes in Croatia and Serbia as Balkan countries battle the region 's worst flooding in recorded history .
